```{r setup, include=MediaLSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
library(xlsx)
library(dplyr)
library(ggpubr)
library(ggsci)
library(rstatix)
library (cowplot)

All_Data <- read_excel("HNM ATG FLX Assay.xlsx", sheet = 2)

All_Data$"Condition" <- factor(All_Data$"Condition", levels = c("LPS Control",	"Low Insulin Control", "Low Insulin OPLA", "Low Insulin POLA", "High Insulin Control", "High Insulin OPLA", "High Insulin POLA"))

All_Data$"Round" <- as.numeric(All_Data$"Round", levels = c("1",	"2", "3"))

```


``` {R ATG FLX}

aov.res <- aov(`Autophagic flux` ~ Insulin * FA_Type * FA_Amount * Round, data = All_Data)

summary(aov.res)

All_Data$"Round" <- factor(All_Data$"Round", levels = c("1",	"2", "3"))

ggbarplot(All_Data, x = "Condition", "Autophagic flux",
       add = "mean_se", error.plot = "upper_errorbar", palette = "npg", legend = "none", fill = "Condition", ylab = "Autophagic flux") +
  scale_x_discrete(labels = function(x) str_wrap(x, width = 12)) +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0,0), limits=c(-1, 10)) +
theme(axis.text.x = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 12),
axis.text.y = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 16),
axis.title.x = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 18),
axis.title.y = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 18),
plot.title = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 22, face = "bold", hjust = 0.5))
ggsave('C:/Users/fwestcott/OneDrive - Nexus365/Desktop/Results/HNM/Graphs/ATG FLX.png')

```
